about_the_game:
"Sword Hidden" is a visual novel written by Yi Nv with a martial arts style. It mainly tells the story of a young girl named Wen Xue who first enters the martial arts world and is caught up in a long-standing feud. She grows up and loves in the wind and rain of the martial arts world.
The background of the fictional dynasty's martial arts world consists of four strategic characters.
